TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AxisScrollBar extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

span.span: Represents the scrollbar of a chart axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类作为公开属性的类。The class is exposed as the property of the class. 滚动条允许最终用户滚动浏览数据时所显示的数据子集。Scrollbars allow the end user to scroll through data when a subset of data is being displayed. 数据的子集称为视图，并由表示类。A subset of data is referred to as a view, and is represented by the class. 仅发生缩放时显示滚动条。Scrollbars are only shown when zooming occurs. 换而言之，即使启用了滚动条，它才可见时显示一个视图。In other words, even if a scrollbar is enabled, it will only be visible when a view is being displayed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要修复的滚动条的位置，图表区的绘图区的位置不能设置。To fix the position of scrollbars, the plotting area position of a chart area must not be set to . 若要显式设置绘图区的位置，请使用属性。To explicitly set the plotting area position, use the property. 若要首次显示一个图表时显示滚动条，请使用类属性和方法，使视图最初显示给最终用户。To display scrollbars when a chart is first displayed, use the class properties and methods so that a view is initially displayed to end users. 可以使用这将设置背景色、 按钮颜色和宽度的滚动条类。The background color, button color and width of scrollbars can be set using this class. 请注意，有两种主要类型的滚动： 大型滚动时，出现这种情况是当最终用户单击的滚动条背景中 — 也就是说，该滚动条滚动块; 未涵盖的部分和小滚动功能，就会出现在最终用户单击左/右时或向上/向下按钮。Note that there are two main types of scrolling: large scrolling, which occurs when the end user clicks in the background of a scrollbar—that is, that part of a scrollbar not covered by the thumb; and small scrolling, which occurs when the end user clicks a left/right or up/down button. 若要控制大尺寸的滚动，请使用属性的对象。To control the large scrolling size, use the property of the object. 若要设置小滚动尺寸，请使用属性的类。To set the small scrolling size, use the property of the class.

summary.span: 获取或设置滚动条的背景色。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of a scrollbar.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示滚动条的背景色。

span.span: A value that represents the background color of the scrollbar.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以设置为任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 红色、 绿色、 蓝色） 颜色。This property can be set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) color. 如果此属性的值是，将由滚动条的背景色正用于滚动条的图表区的属性值。If the value of this property is , the background color of the scrollbar will be determined by the property value of the chart area the scrollbar is being used for.

summary.span: 获取或设置滚动条按钮的颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the color of the scrollbar buttons.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示滚动条按钮的背景色。

span.span: A value that represents the color of the scrollbar buttons.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性获取或设置左/右、 向上/向下滚动条的重置和 thumb 按钮的颜色。Use this property to get or set the color of the left/right, up/down, reset and thumb buttons of a scrollbar. 如果此属性的值是，按钮所使用的颜色将由属性值。If the value of this property is , the color used for the buttons will be determined by the property value.

summary.span: 获取或设置滚动条的线条颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the line color of a scrollbar.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示滚动条的线条颜色。

span.span: A value that represents the line color of the scrollbar.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示用于中向上/向下的箭头和左/右按钮，重置按钮，以及整个滚动条的边框内符号的颜色。This property represents the color used for the arrows in up/down and left/right buttons, the symbol inside the reset button, as well as the border of the entire scrollbar. 如果此属性的值是，将由使用的线条颜色属性值。If the value of this property is , the line color used will be determined by the property value.

summary.span: 获取或设置滚动条的宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the width of a scrollbar, in pixels.

value.span: 滚动条的宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The width of a scrollbar in pixels.
The default value is 14 pixels.

value.span: 该值的范围是 5 到 20 像素。

span.span: The value can range from 5 to 20 pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取或设置滚动条，可以为 5 到 20 像素的宽度。Gets or sets the width of a scrollbar, which can be from 5 to 20 pixels. 将此属性设置为 0 可以禁用滚动条。Set this property to zero to disable a scrollbar. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要修复的滚动条的位置，图表区的绘图区的位置不能设置。To fix the position of scrollbars, the plotting area position of a chart area must not be set to . 若要显式设置绘图区的位置，请使用属性。To explicitly set the plotting area position, use the property.
